narrative_summary: - Assistant explored the Dagster project structure to locate the customer_summary asset definition and understand its upstream dependencies
- Found the customer_summary asset in /src/acme_co_dataeng/defs/customer_summary.py with three upstream dependencies: customer_events, sales_data, and zip_codes
- Invoked the dagster-skills:dagster-expert skill to get guidance on configuring different automation conditions for different upstream assets
- Read multiple reference documents from the dagster-expert skill including:
- declarative-automation/operators.md for understanding since() and cron ticks
- Implemented a declarative automation condition using:
- eager().allow() to trigger execution when customer_events or sales_data update
- all_deps_match() with newly_updated().since(cron_tick_passed()) to require zip_codes be fresh since the start of the month (cron "0 0 1 * *")
- Combined both conditions with AND (&) operator
- Updated the customer_summary asset definition with the automation_condition parameter
- Verified the implementation by reading the updated file
